name: Banana Diesel
description: Banana Diesel balances the polar effects of its parent strains, Banana Kush and Super Sour Diesel. A slightly energizing kick followed by intense focus makes this a perfect strain for daytime consumption with effects that steer clear of undesirable lethargy. These thick, pale green buds reek a sweet, fruity aroma and preface the tangy taste to come. Banana Diesel is a potent appetite stimulant and stress combatant, suitable for either weight or mood disorders.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Uplifted, Tingly, Pain, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Headache
